speaker: char
text: Hello, friend! I’m here again, for another round of makeup. My date last time really liked my look but unfortunately that’s all she liked.

speaker: char
text: I don’t really understand it, I tried really hard to do what I thought she wanted.

speaker: char
text: But tonight I have another date with this cool looking guy. You should also make me look really cool.

speaker: char
text: Really different from what I look like, basically. This time, I’m gonna nail what he wants!
